answers.answer: Glucose test is to measure your sugar levels and you fail if your sugar is too high. You just drink a drink, wait an hour, and then they take your blood. For the one hour one, you can fail simply because you had to much sugar the night before or that morning, so you may want to limit sugar intake before hand in order to pass. If you fail the 3 hour one, which is the follow up test, it most likely means you have gestational diabetes.
The glucose test consists of drinking a drink with a measured amount of sugar in it and then waiting an hour and having blood drawn. If your body does not respond to the sugar right you can fail.
They also tell you to fast for 8 hours before you drink the drink
